creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
LL printed in plate: [Imp. Delatre. Rue St. Jacques. 171.]
LL recto, in pencil: [Whistler. The Unsafe Tenement.]
LR verso, in pencil: [ 241]
portfolio: From Twelve Etchings from Nature (French Set)
provenance: William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore., sold to Jones, 1916; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis, 1916, sold and given to MIA.
signed: Printed signature LR in the plate: [Whistler]
title: The Unsafe Tenement
